players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden demise. Let's all stay focused and work together to find out who did this."
Bob: "Charlie's death is a huge blow to our town. We must work together and share any information we have to uncover the truth."
Bob: "I'm concerned that we don't have enough information about Charlie's death. Can we discuss the events of last night and see if anyone noticed anything unusual?"
You: "I think we should investigate Charlie's body and see if there are any clues that can help us figure out who killed him."
Diana: "I remember hearing some strange noises last night, around the time Charlie was killed. I think it's important that we investigate further and consider all possibilities."
